32.
What, like this? Go away! Get out
of here!
That’s it exactly.
Go awayi What, my lodgers and all?
Get out of here!
Especially your lodgers.
Go awayi But they*11 be offended.
Go awayi
That wouldn’t be surprising.
But they* 11 leave my inni I shall
lose all my customersi Go awayi
That was precisely what I had in mind!
But I shall be ruinedi Get out of
here!
Not entirely, 1*11 see you make just
enough to keep me in comfort.
But then I shall be working the rest
of my days for youi
That’s the first sensible idea on the
subject that you’ve had. Well, I'll
leave you to practice your treatment
of your guests while I toast my toes
by the fire.
-32-
